branchCategory.name: Rodless Cylinder - Magnetically Coupled - Sine Wave Motion
branchCategory.description: <p>Rodless cylinder, magnetically coupled series REA/REB is designed to eliminate end of stroke shock yet maintain high speed.</p>

breadCrumb.name: Rodless Cylinder - Magnetically Coupled - Sine Wave Motion

branchItem.name: Rodless Cylinder, REA, Magnetically Coupled, Sine, Accelerating & Decelaration
branchItem.description: <p>The REA, Sine Rodless Cylinder - Magnetically Coupled accelerates slowly at beginning stroke and decelerates at end stroke designed for working with delicate materials such as silicone wafers, magnetic disks or LCD substrates yet optimizing throughput with speeds of up to 300 mm/sec. The REA features specially designed U-shaped cushion rings at the cylinder end caps to prevent hard stops. The corresponding sides of the piston head have special cushion packing to faciliate smooth acceleration at the start of stroke. <span style="color: #ff0000;">Please note the REA must be used with an external guide to support the load.</span></p>

branchItem.name: Rodless Cylinder, REB, Magnetically Coupled, Sine, Accelerating & Decelaration
branchItem.description: <p>The REB, Sine Rodless Cylinder - Magnetically Coupled accelerates smoothly at beginning stroke and decelerates at end stroke designed for working with delicate materials such as silicone wafers, magnetic disks or LCD substrates yet optimizing throughput with speeds of up to 600 mm/sec.</p>
